Tool Library

NameGDAL/OGR
AuthorSAGA User Group Associaton (c) 2008
Version2.0

Description

Interface to Frank Warmerdam's Geospatial Data Abstraction Library (GDAL).
Version 2.2.3
Homepage: www.gdal.org

Tools

IDName
0Import Raster
1Export Raster
2Export GeoTIFF

4Export Shapes

6Import NetCDF
7Create Raster Catalogue from Files
